import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' function Categories() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [categories] = state.categoriesAPI.categories const [category, setCategory] = useState('') return (
setCategory(e.target.value)} />
{ categories.map(category => (

{category.name}

)) }
) } export default Categories
